import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Ticket Priorities"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/priorities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the site-defined priority level metadata, including numeric score ranges, labels, and badge colors. Caller can map the numeric `Priority` and optional `PriorityLevelId` returned by ticket endpoints to the descriptive values used in the UI.

**Workflow Example**
1. Retrieve the ticket: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) â†’ read `Item.Priority` and `Item.PriorityLevelId`.
2. Call this endpoint to resolve the matching priority metadata for display in dashboards or escalations.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
